title.text: The only AI customer service Solution you need

description.text: Resolve issues faster and boost customer satisfaction -- all while reducing team workload -- with the only customer service solutions you'll ever need.

headLine.text: Automate conversations with the power of AI

description.text: Reduce support volumes and incease customer satisfaction in minutes with intercom's AI-powered chatbots and automation tools

keyPoints.text: Unlock the best AI-powered customer service tools in minutes
Lower your costs with more efficient support teams
Scale Support without sacrificing customer experience

useCases.headLine: Fin
useCases.subLine: Our AI-powered bot automatically and accuarately answers support quersions with zero training required

useCases.headLine: Workflows
useCases.subLine: Easily build powerfull no-code automations with bots, triggers, conditions, and rules -- all in one place

useCases.headLine: Ai-powered Inbox
useCases.subLine: Instantly generate replies, recap, conversations for other agents, and create new help articles.

useCases.headLine: Article suggestions
useCases.subLine: Immediately recommend helpful content with machine learning -- directly in your product

useCases.headLine: Conversation topics
useCases.subLine: Better understand your customers with AI-powered analysis of support conversations.

children.text: "Our bot deflection rate with our previous customer service solutions was 5-10%. With Intercom, we archieved
65% bot deflection within just one week

headLine.text: Maximize team productivity with the world's fastest shared Inbox

description.text: Our AI-enhanced Inbox is lightning fast, easy-to-use, and optimized for efficiency -- with everything a modern support team needs.

useCases.headLine: Ticketing
useCases.subLine: Easily collaborate with colleagues to quickly slove complex problems, as well as allow customers to track progress in real time.

useCases.headLine: Configurable
useCases.subLine: Change language, turn on dark mode, save custom views and more.

useCases.headLine: Omnichannel
useCases.subLine: See all your support conversations in one place.

useCases.headLine: Multiplayer
useCases.subLine: Collaborate efficiently with teammates in real time thanks to co-presence indicators, notes, and @mentions.

useCases.headLine: Lightning fast
useCases.subLine: Win time back with powerful macros, nonexistent load times, and simple shortcuts that put yourn entire inbox a CMD+K away.

useCases.headLine: Team management
useCases.subLine: Get more done by optimizing operations with live dashboards, reporting, work managment tools, and more.

testimonials.authorRol: International Strategy and Operations Manager, Wolt

children.text: "The thing i noticed most about Inbox is the speed. In a test, we saw a
15% increase in the number of conversations handled.

headLine.text: Get ahead of known issues and slash support volume

description.text: Resolve customer issues before they contact you. Our proactive support tools cut down contact rates boosting customer satisfaction

useCases.headLine: Help Center
useCases.subLine: Let customers search and browse support articles directly in your product and on the web

useCases.headLine: Checklists
useCases.subLine: Onboard customers without taking time from your team thanks to contextual and presonalized task lists.

useCases.headLine: Banners
useCases.subLine: Inform specific customers of planned changes, events, or services interruptions.

useCases.headLine: Tooltips
useCases.subLine: Add help content directly into your product without enginnering resources using our no-code UI.

useCases.headLine: Outbound Messages
useCases.subLine: Automatically trigger an in-app chat, email, or SMS message when a customer needs help.

useCases.headLine: Product Tours
useCases.subLine: Drive adoption of new features and deepen customer engagement with guided experiences.

children.text: "Self-service and proactive support have helped us
over the past two years, even as our user base has continued to grow."

headLine.text: Deliver Conversational support where it works best for your customers

description.text: Our Messenger supports customers when it's most effective--the moment they need help in your product. And with email, SMS, and more, they can also pick whatever channel works best.

keyPoints.text: Deliver support at the exact right moment
Give your customers more flexibility and control over support channel

useCases.headLine: Customizable Messenger
useCases.subLine: it's your Messenger--so have it match your brand with infinite design options.

useCases.headLine: Configurable experiences
useCases.subLine: Show and hide different content, features--even entire Spaces-- to create bespoke Messenger experiences.

useCases.headLine: Mobile
useCases.subLine: Bring the Messenger to your mobile app with powerful iOS and Android SDK's.

useCases.headLine: Omnichannel messaging
useCases.subLine: Support customers using their preferred channel-- whether that's email, SMS, social, or more.

useCases.headLine: Phone
useCases.subLine: Centralize your phone support using our integrations (with more comming soon).

useCases.headLine: Switch
useCases.subLine: Reduce phone wait times by letting customers switch to messaging mid-call.

children.text: "Intercom powers our customer communications, delivering conversions, customer engagement, and presonalized support.
The Messenger is the heart of this strategy.

description.text: Get all your automation, conversations, tickets, customer data, and reporting working together seamlessly. Maximize team performance by connecting all your other tools to our platform.

keyPoints.text: Maximize team performance with actionable insights
Stop switching between tools and speed up workflows
See all your data in one place

useCases.headLine: Reporting
useCases.subLine: Understand and improve the performance of your bots and team with flexible and customizable reports.

useCases.headLine: Customer data
useCases.subLine: View, segment, and filter all your customer data -- adn modalt it however works best for your business

useCases.headLine: Behavioral Data
useCases.subLine: Craft the best customer support experiences using a complete picture of past actions

useCases.headLine: Custom Actions
useCases.subLine: Powr bots and workflows with live customer data stored in other tools--no engineering resources required

useCases.headLine: Apps and Integrations
useCases.subLine: Get all your tools working as one--and add more to existing workflows--with 300+ apps.

useCases.headLine: APIs and Webhooks
useCases.subLine: Configure Intercom to work best for you with our easy-to-use APIs and webhooks

children.text: "We have almost all of our support channels integrated into one system, making it easy for us to manage our support, as well as
take data-driven approach to continuously improving our service
